QuestData.Title: Tomb Raidering
QuestData.Description: I said to myself over and over, "Don't go near the citadel. Don't go near the citadel." But what did I do? I went to the citadel. Almost had my hands on that sweet treasure chest before I got chased off by a bunch of crazy demons. I made it out of there with just my helmet and my life!
QuestData.LogDescription: Look for the rumored treasure outside the Tomb of Sargeras.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'm always lookin' for more treasure!
QuestData.RewardText: Did you bother to read the label on this potion? I'm going to assume, no. You may find some sucker who will pay you for it.$B$BBetter luck next time kid.
